seo.title: About SmartLead Marketing
seo.description: Meet the team helping real estate professionals predict and win the next listing.

story.heading: We believe the next listing is predictable
story.body: SmartLead Marketing was founded by data scientists and real estate operators who saw first-hand how difficult it is to stay in front of homeowners ready to sell. We built SmartLead so agents and brokerages could combine predictive intelligence with turnkey campaigns in one platform.
